pal 0.0.9070
  • Reference

Get roxygen2 blocks

Source: R/pal-GEN.R
roxy_blocks.Rd

Parses the roxygen2 package documentation of a specific R package or from a single .R source code file.

roxy_blocks(pkg = NULL, ..., text = NULL, quiet = TRUE)

Arguments

pkg, text

Either a package name or a character vector of R source code lines to extract the object's roxygen2 tag value from.
...

Further arguments passed on to download.packages(), excluding pkgs, destdir, available and type. Only relevant if pkg is providedDynamic dots are supported.)`
quiet

Whether or not to suppress status output from internal processing.

Value

A list of roxy_block objects.

See also

Other package documentation functions: roxy_obj(), roxy_tag_value()

Examples

# Either provide an R source file as a character vector `text` ...
text <- readr::read_lines(paste0("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/r-lib/rlang/",
                                 "db52a58d505b65f58ba922d4752b5b0061f2a98c/R/fn.R"))

pal::roxy_blocks(text = text) |> head(n = 3L)

#> [[1]]
#> <roxy_block> [<text>:39]
#>   $tag
#>     [line:  1] @title 'Create a function' {parsed}
#>     [line:  3] @description '...' {parsed}
#>     [line: 10] @param 'args A named list or pairlist of default argume...' {parsed}
#>     [line: 14] @param 'body A language object representing the code in...' {parsed}
#>     [line: 17] @param 'env The parent environment of the function, def...' {parsed}
#>     [line: 19] @export '' {parsed}
#>     [line: 20] @examples '...' {parsed}
#>     [????:???] @usage '<generated>' {parsed}
#>     [????:???] @.formals '<generated>' {parsed}
#>     [????:???] @backref '<text>' {parsed}
#>   $call   new_function <- function(args, body, env = caller_env()) { ...
#>   $object <function> 
#>     $topic new_function
#>     $alias new_function
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> <roxy_block> [<text>:50]
#>   $tag
#>     [line:  1] @title 'Name of a primitive function' {parsed}
#>     [line: 47] @param 'prim A primitive function such as [base::c()].' {parsed}
#>     [line: 48] @keywords 'internal' {parsed}
#>     [line: 49] @export '' {parsed}
#>     [????:???] @usage '<generated>' {parsed}
#>     [????:???] @.formals '<generated>' {parsed}
#>     [????:???] @backref '<text>' {parsed}
#>   $call   prim_name <- function(prim) { ...
#>   $object <function> 
#>     $topic prim_name
#>     $alias prim_name
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> <roxy_block> [<text>:91]
#>   $tag
#>     [line:  1] @title 'Extract arguments from a function' {parsed}
#>     [line:  3] @description '`fn_fmls()` returns a named list of formal argu...' {parsed}
#>     [line:  9] @details 'Unlike `formals()`, these helpers throw an erro...' {parsed}
#>     [line: 73] @param 'fn A function. It is lookep up in the calling f...' {parsed}
#>     [line: 75] @seealso '[call_args()] and [call_args_names()]' {parsed}
#>     [line: 76] @export '' {parsed}
#>     [line: 77] @examples '...' {parsed}
#>     [????:???] @usage '<generated>' {parsed}
#>     [????:???] @.formals '<generated>' {parsed}
#>     [????:???] @backref '<text>' {parsed}
#>   $call   fn_fmls <- function(fn = caller_fn()) { ...
#>   $object <function> 
#>     $topic fn_fmls
#>     $alias fn_fmls
#> 

# ... or provide a package name
if (FALSE) {
pal::roxy_blocks(pkg = "rlang",
                 repos = "https://cloud.r-project.org") |>
  head(n = 3L)}
